name: codebase-express-react
description: Monorepo orchestrator for front-end and back-end

scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "npm install --prefix back-end" "npm install --prefix front-end"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "npm run --prefix back-end dev" "npm run --prefix front-end dev"
scripts.build: npm run --prefix back-end build && npm run --prefix front-end build
